actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the terms of office for Members of Congress.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits a Member of the House of Representatives from serving more than four full terms in the House and a Senator from serving more than two full terms in the Senate (excluding any part of a partial term to which the person may have been elected or appointed).

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the terms of office for Members of Congress.
